question.text: The E.M. wave with shortest wavelength among the following is

solution.text: If we look at the spectrum of electromagnetic waves then the order of a wavelength is, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>λ</mi><mrow><mi>g</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>a</mi></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>λ</mi><mrow><mi>X</mi><mo>-</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>λ</mi><mrow><mi>U</mi><mi>V</mi><mo> </mo><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>y</mi><mi>s</mi></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>λ</mi><mrow><mi>V</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>b</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>e</mi></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>λ</mi><mrow><mi>I</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>f</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>d</mi></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>λ</mi><mrow><mi>M</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>w</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>v</mi><mi>e</mi></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>λ</mi><mrow><mi>R</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>d</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>o</mi></mrow></msub></math>, so from the above spectrum the wavelength of gamma rays is minimum and then the wavelength of a radio wave is maximum, so the shortest wavelength is for gamma-rays.
